p:
In the present study, more sebaceous glands and hair follicles were observed in IL-10 −/− mice fed EPA (Fig. 4D). The presence of these appendages can improve the wound healing process, considering that, in the epithelial compartment of the folicles, there are stem cells that can differentiate into numerous cell types
51 . Furthermore, hair folicles are a source of pro-angiogenic factors, such as VEGF
52 . Few studies have investigated the effects of fatty acids on skin hair growth
53, 54 .
